archimate:ImplementationEvent.name: 20.11.2023 -Meeting with Outi Hotarinen / Quality Assurance Team
archimate:ImplementationEvent.documentation:
Sami had a meeting with the Quality Assurance Specialist Outi Hotarinen, whom walked him through their process and showed all the materials they had. Sami managed to get us access to their "ISAE2023 Test Documentation" teams which contains lot's of data for us. They have also an internal Teams, which contains working documents - in there Outi cannot provide access but she will send a copy of a couple of interesting documents.
Sami has also introduced Outi to our new Security Baseline approach - obviously she was delighted to see that there is now progress in that area.
Within their work, the biggest pressure is the "responce letters" which needs to be finalized week 47 for all the deviations.
